tool_description:
Complete list of current trailers of new video games. The list is updated daily to have access to the best trailers with all their information.

The endpoint is paginated and can be sorted and filtered by most of its fields. You can also get the detail of an individual trailer.

Each trailer includes a preview thumbnail and its author.
name: Video games trailers
title: Video games trailers

api_list.name: Trailer detail
api_list.description: All the details of a trailer by its ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://video-games-trailers.p.rapidapi.com/821773965876822019"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-games-trailers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://video-games-trailers.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-games-trailers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Trailer list
api_list.description:
Complete list of current trailers. 
The endpoint is paginated and can be sorted and filtered by most of its fields. You can also get the detail of an individual trailer.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Default sort: `-date`. You can sort by `title` ASC or `-title` DESC.
